title: Share of U.S. travelers who have had items stolen or lost 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Smartphone has the highest Share of respondents and Passport has the lowest Share of respondents.
The lowest value at Response Passport is 2.5x times less than the highest value at Smartphone.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
